help-file.title: "VAMPIRIC TRANCE"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Generic
"Vampiric Trance" infuses the caster with the power of the undead, granting a higher hitroll and damroll, as well as a larger number of hitpoints. The power of "Vampiric Touch" is granted to the caster as well. Be warned, when the Necromancer is in this form, they cannot control any Undead of their own.
